;;;57         if (hWin) {

;;;58           WM_Obj * pWin;  
;;;59           WM_LOCK();

;;;60           pWin = WM_HANDLE2PTR(hWin);

;;;35     void WM_EnableMemdev (WM_HWIN hWin) {
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}

;;;36       GUI_USE_PARA(hWin);
000004  bf00              NOP      
;;;37       #if GUI_SUPPORT_MEMDEV
;;;38         if (hWin) {
000006  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.34|
;;;39           WM_Obj * pWin;
;;;40           WM_LOCK();
000008  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Lock
;;;41           pWin = WM_HANDLE2PTR(hWin);  
00000c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
000012  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;42           pWin->Status |= (WM_SF_MEMDEV);
000014  8ba8              LDRH     r0,[r5,#0x1c]
000016  f0400004          ORR      r0,r0,#4
00001a  83a8              STRH     r0,[r5,#0x1c]
;;;43           WM_UNLOCK();
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Unlock
;;;44         }
000020  bf00              NOP      
                  |L2.34|
;;;45       #else
;;;46         GUI_DEBUG_WARN("WM_EnableMemdev: No effect because disabled in GUIConf.h (GUI_SUPPORT_MEMDEV == 0)");
;;;47       #endif
;;;48     }
